titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2446) to reauthorize the Afghanistan Freedom Support Act of 2002, and for other purposes.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2446) to reauthorize the Afghanistan Freedom Support Act of 2002, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-174, by Mr. McGovern.

All points of order against consideration of the bill are waived except those arising under clause 9 or 10 of rule XXI. Notwithstanding clause 11 of rule XVIII, no amendment to the bill shall be in order except those printed in the report of the Committee on Rules accompanying this resolution.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 67.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 453.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: Passed/agreed to in House: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 220 - 195 (Roll no. 431).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 220 - 195 (Roll no. 431).

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 2446 (Afghanistan Freedom and Security Support Act of 2007).
